snippet.title: 蛮勇戦域VARVARION Trailer #1
snippet.description:
「蛮勇戦域バルバリオン」は個人で開発中の高速３D剣戟アクションゲームです。
2021年 各種インディーゲームイベント出展予定。
VARVARION is a high-speed sword combat action game developed by one person.
Planned to be showcased at various Indie game events in 2021.

Game Engine :UNITY

Developed by POLYGONOMICON
Homepage: https://varvarion.com/
Twitter:https://twitter.com/polygonomicon
Blog：http://polygonomicon.blog111.fc2.com/


music from YouFulca (https://wingless-seraph.net)
